# Installation

### PULL or download the project 

### install all dependency
### npm run dev
### cd sanity && sanity start

## Features:-
* SignIn/SignOut
* Post Tweet with images
* Comment
* Side Widget which can be generated by searching a twitter username (Pending) 
*
